issue.subject: Computer Problems
issue.userMessage: My computer makes a fart noise every time I turn it on.
issue.adminMessage: I've ordered you a new computer.

issue.subject: Broken Printer
issue.userMessage: The printer is jammed with packing peanuts

issue.subject: Hostile Work Envoirnment
issue.userMessage: Every time I log into my computer, it gives me the middle finger
issue.adminMessage: Just give it some time to cool off, message me if it resolves.
